description:
Adjustable buckles attach securely to your Big Agnes Goosenest Cot, keeping your pad in place all night long.

  • Made from durable, open-weave mesh
  • 8 adjustable buckle straps
  • Dimensions: 193 x 122cm
  • Stuff sack included
name: Big Agnes Goosenest Accessory Double Wide Cover - Unisex
